original_text:
Maya Gold
Maya Gold è un 5 reel, 25 slot payline di IGT che ha un tema Maya e può essere giocato da 25p a 10 sterline a rotazione su tutti i dispositivi, compresi smartphone e tablet. Viene fornito con Mini Slot Bonus e Memory Bonus dove si possono vincere premi in contanti. E’ tutto sulla funzione Free Spins Bonus dove si possono vincere fino a 1.000 giri gratis con un moltiplicatore 2x.
Una grafica epica
Immerso in una foresta pluviale, si va alla ricerca di antichi tesori in questa fessura a tema maya. Con un tempio Maya dietro i mulinelli, Maya Gold ha un’atmosfera da slot a terra. I simboli includono Chichen Itza, tucani, spade, capi Maya, dee Maya, maschere Maya, monete d’oro e statue Maya.
Quest’ultimo è il più gratificante in qualche modo, con 2, 3, 4 o 5 in combinazione che ti danno 0,4, 6, 40 o 200 volte la tua puntata. Il giaguaro è il simbolo jolly e appare solo sulle bobine 1, 2 e 3 – sostituisce tutti i simboli, tranne le rotazioni libere, il Mini Slot Bonus e i simboli bonus. Le formazioni vincenti per formare da sinistra a destra a partire dal rotolo 1.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Ogni volta che il simbolo del bonus (la faccia Maya grigia) appare sul rullo 5, otterrete 25 punti per ogni linea di pagamento moltiplicato per la linea di scommessa – se giocato a £1 per giro, per esempio, otterrete 100 punti ogni volta che il simbolo del bonus appare. Una volta accumulati 1.000 punti, attiverai la funzione Memory Bonus.
Poi hai 4 giri per trovare una coppia di premi corrispondenti che appaiono sulle lastre di pietra. Se si rivela una coppia corrispondente su una qualsiasi delle 2 lastre di pietra, si vince il premio in mostra. Questi premi possono variare da 1 a 25 volte la tua puntata totale. Se si scopre una lastra con un moltiplicatore 2x, la vincita viene raddoppiata (cioè fino a 50 volte la puntata dei premi).
L’attrazione principale di Maya Gold è la funzione Free Spins Bonus – si gioca quando si ottengono 3 o più simboli di spargimento di giri gratuiti in qualsiasi punto dei rulli. 3, 4 o 5 di essi ti daranno rispettivamente 8, 20 o 100 giri gratis – tutte le vincite sono soggette anche a un moltiplicatore 2x.
Inoltre, durante la funzione appariranno degli scatter di giri gratuiti, il che significa che potrai recuperare la funzione Free Spins Bonus – 3, 4 o 5 ti ricompenseranno con 8, 20 o 100 giri gratuiti in più. Infatti, è possibile recuperare più volte con un massimo di 1.000 giri gratuiti disponibili in totale. Infine, è possibile attivare le funzioni Mini Slot Bonus e Memory Bonus all’interno della funzione Free Spins Bonus.
L’Oro Maya viene fornito con una funzione Mini Slot Bonus – questo è giocato quando si ottengono 3 o più simboli Mini Slot Bonus appare da sinistra a partire dalla bobina 1. Più simboli appaiono, più giri di slot bonus ti verranno assegnati – 3, 4 o 5 simboli Mini Slot Bonus ti daranno rispettivamente 1, 2 o 3 giri di slot bonus. Il set di rulli Mini Slot gira e vi darà una combinazione vincente per ogni giro bonus:

3 Ciliegie vi ricompenserà con un premio compreso tra 0,8 e 2 volte la vostra puntata.
3 Arance vi ricompenserà con un premio compreso tra 2,4 e 5 volte la vostra puntata.
3 Barrette vi ricompenserà con un premio compreso tra 6 e 40 volte la vostra puntata.

Altre Slot Machine simili
Hai scelto questa Slot Machine, con ogni probabilità, perché sei appassionato della civilità maya, con tutti i suoi colori sgargianti e i suoi tesori e segreti nascosti. Se è così, ti consigliamo di provare a scommettere i tuoi soldi anche in Mayan Temple Revenge, la Slot Machine prodotta da Capecod che ti permetterà di fare un sacco di soldi facili.

raw_translation.response:
Maya Gold is a 5-reel, 25-payline slot game from IGT with a Maya theme that can be played from 25p to £10 per spin on all devices, including smartphones and tablets. It features a Mini Slot Bonus and Memory Bonus where you can win cash prizes. But the main attraction is the Free Spins Bonus, where you can win up to 1,000 free spins with a 2x multiplier.

Immerse yourself in the rainforest as you search for ancient treasures in this Maya-themed slot game. With a Maya temple looming in the background, Maya Gold has a truly immersive, real-world slot experience. The symbols include Chichen Itza, toucans, swords, Maya leaders, Maya goddesses, Maya masks, gold coins and Maya statues.

The most rewarding symbol is the Maya statue, with 2, 3, 4 or 5 in combination giving you 0.4, 6, 40 or 200 times your stake, respectively. The jaguar is the wild symbol and appears only on reels 1, 2 and 3 – it substitutes for all symbols except for free spins, the Mini Slot Bonus and bonus symbols. Winning formations are formed from left to right starting from reel 1.

Every time the bonus symbol (the gray Maya face) appears on reel 5, you will get 25 points for each payline multiplied by the bet line. For example, if you play at £1 per spin, you will get 100 points every time the bonus symbol appears. Once you have accumulated 1,000 points, you will activate the Memory Bonus feature.

You will then have 4 spins to find a matching pair of prizes that appear on stone slabs. If a matching pair is revealed on any of the 2 stone slabs, you win the prize on display. These prizes can range from 1 to 25 times your total bet. If you uncover a slab with a 2x multiplier, your win is doubled (up to 50 times the prize bet).

The main attraction of Maya Gold is the Free Spins Bonus feature – it is triggered when you get 3 or more scattered free spin symbols anywhere on the reels. 3, 4 or 5 of them will give you 8, 20 or 100 free spins, respectively – all wins are also subject to a 2x multiplier.

Additionally, during the feature, free spin scatters will appear, meaning you can re-trigger the Free Spins Bonus – 3, 4 or 5 will reward you with an extra 8, 20 or 100 free spins. In fact, you can re-trigger multiple times with a maximum of 1,000 free spins available in total. Lastly, you can activate the Mini Slot Bonus and Memory Bonus features within the Free Spins Bonus feature.

Maya Gold comes with a Mini Slot Bonus feature – this is played when you get 3 or more Mini Slot Bonus symbols appearing from left to right starting from reel 1. The more symbols that appear, the more bonus slot spins you will be awarded – 3, 4 or 5 Mini Slot Bonus symbols will give you 1, 2 or 3 bonus slot spins, respectively. The Mini Slot reel set spins and gives you a winning combination for each bonus spin:

- 3 Cherries will reward you with a prize ranging from 0.8 to 2 times your stake.
- 3 Oranges will reward you with a prize ranging from 2.4 to 5 times your stake.
- 3 Bars will reward you with a prize ranging from 6 to 40 times your stake.

If you chose this slot game, chances are you are a true enthusiast of Maya civilization, with all its vibrant colors and hidden treasures and secrets. If so, we recommend trying your luck with Mayan Temple Revenge, the slot game produced by Capecod that will let you make easy money.

With a Maya temple looming in the background, Maya Gold has a truly immersive, real-world slot experience. The most rewarding symbol is the Maya statue, with 2, 3, 4 or 5 in combination giving you 0.4, 6, 40 or 200 times your stake, respectively. The jaguar is the wild symbol and appears only on reels 1, 2 and 3 – it substitutes for all symbols except for free spins, the Mini Slot Bonus and bonus symbols. You will then have 4 spins to find a matching pair of prizes that appear on stone slabs. If a matching pair is revealed on any of the 2 stone slabs, you win the prize on display. These prizes can range from 1 to 25 times your total bet. If you uncover a slab with a 2x multiplier, your win is doubled (up to 50 times the prize bet).

The main attraction of Maya Gold is the Free Spins Bonus feature – it is triggered when you get 3 or more scattered free spin symbols anywhere on the reels. 3, 4 or 5 of them will give you 8, 20 or 100 free spins, respectively – all wins are also subject to a 2x multiplier.

Additionally, during the feature, free spin scatters will appear, meaning you can re-trigger the Free Spins Bonus – 3, 4 or 5 will reward you with an extra 8, 20 or 100 free spins. In fact, you can re-trigger multiple times with a maximum of 1,000 free spins available in total. Lastly, you can activate the Mini Slot Bonus and Memory Bonus features within the Free Spins Bonus feature.

Maya Gold comes with a Mini Slot Bonus feature – this is played when you get 3 or more Mini Slot Bonus symbols appearing from left to right starting from reel 1. The more symbols that appear, the more bonus slot spins you will be awarded – 3, 4 or 5 Mini Slot Bonus symbols will give you 1, 2 or 3 bonus slot spins, respectively. The Mini Slot reel set spins and gives you a winning combination for each bonus spin:

- 3 Oranges will reward you with a prize ranging from 2.4 to 5 times your stake.
- 3 Bars will reward you with a prize ranging from 6 to 40 times your stake.

With a Maya temple looming in the background, Maya Gold has a truly immersive, real-world slot experience. The symbols include Chichen Itza, toucans, swords, Maya leaders, Maya goddesses, Maya masks, gold coins and Maya statues.

The most rewarding symbol is the Maya statue, with 2, 3, 4 or 5 in combination giving you 0.4, 6, 40 or 200 times your stake, respectively. The jaguar is the wild symbol and appears only on reels 1, 2 and 3 – it substitutes for all symbols except for free spins, the Mini Slot Bonus and bonus symbols. Winning formations are formed from left to right starting from reel 1.

Every time the bonus symbol (the gray Maya face) appears on reel 5, you will get 25 points for each payline multiplied by the bet line. For example, if you play at £1 per spin, you will get 100 points every time the bonus symbol appears. Once you have accumulated 1,000 points, you will activate the Memory Bonus feature.

You will then have 4 spins to find a matching pair of prizes that appear on stone slabs. If a matching pair is revealed on any of the 2 stone slabs, you win the prize on display. These prizes can range from 1 to 25 times your total bet. If you uncover a slab with a 2x multiplier, your win is doubled (up to 50 times the prize bet).

The main attraction of Maya Gold is the Free Spins Bonus feature – it is triggered when you get 3 or more scattered free spin symbols anywhere on the reels. 3, 4 or 5 of them will give you 8, 20 or 100 free spins, respectively – all wins are also subject to a 2x multiplier.

Additionally, during the feature, free spin scatters will appear, meaning you can re-trigger the Free Spins Bonus – 3, 4 or 5 will reward you with an extra 8, 20 or 100 free spins. In fact, you can re-trigger multiple times with a maximum of 1,000 free spins available in total. Lastly, you can activate the Mini Slot Bonus and Memory Bonus features within the Free Spins Bonus feature.

Maya Gold comes with a Mini Slot Bonus feature – this is played when you get 3 or more Mini Slot Bonus symbols appearing from left to right starting from reel 1. The more symbols that appear, the more bonus slot spins you will be awarded – 3, 4 or 5 Mini Slot Bonus symbols will give you 1, 2 or 3 bonus slot spins, respectively. The Mini Slot reel set spins and gives you a winning combination for each bonus spin:

- 3 Cherries will reward you with a prize ranging from 0.8 to 2 times your stake.
- 3 Oranges will reward you with a prize ranging from 2.4 to 5 times your stake.
- 3 Bars will reward you with a prize ranging from 6 to 40 times your stake.

If you chose this slot game, chances are you are a true enthusiast of Maya civilization, with all its vibrant colors and hidden treasures and secrets. If so, we recommend trying your luck with Mayan Temple Revenge, the slot game produced by Capecod that will let you make easy money.

message.content: Create a dynamic and visually engaging feature image for Maya Gold that captures the essence of the game. The image should be in cartoon style and should feature a happy Maya warrior with glasses. Use bright and bold colors that reflect the vibrant Mayan culture and showcase the main symbols of the game such as gold coins, Maya masks, Maya statues, and the Mini Slot and Memory Bonus symbols. The warrior should be front and center, holding up a gold coin or a mask and smiling broadly, with a temple looming in the background. The text "Maya Gold" should be prominently displayed in a font that complements the cartoon style of the image. Overall, the image should convey the excitement and adventure of discovering hidden treasures in the Mayan rainforest.
